messages.title: GETTING BREXIT DONE MEANS:
messages.content: An extra £33.9 billion for the NHS, 20,000 extra police officers, more funding for every pupil in every school, Brexit done with a deal

messages.title: IT'S TIME TO MOVE BRITAIN FORWARD
messages.content: More delays gridlock government - let's get stuff done

messages.title: NO TOWN LEFT BEHIND
messages.content: Bus passes and village halls protected

keyPolicies.policyDescription: An extra £33.9 billion for the NHS, 50 million extra GP surgery appointments
More funding for every pupil in every school
Getting Brexit done with a deal

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Vote Labour, get Nicola Sturgeon. SNP to back Labour with Scottish Independence vote
mentions.partyLeader: The PM is increasing the National Living Wage
